remarks: A Cartesian product of finite sets such that all but finitely many are singletons is finite.  (Note that ` B ( x ) ` and ` D ( x ) ` are both possibly dependent on ` x ` . ) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Jan-2015.)

ixpfi2.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( A \ C ) ) -> B C_ { D } ) $.
ixpfi2 $p |- ( ph -> X_ x e. A B e. Fin ) $.

$d C x $.
